alert.note: Alert for East Carteret; Hatteras Island; Ocracoke Island (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 17 at 3:30AM EST until December 18 at 12:00AM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO MIDNIGHT EST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Southeast winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...East Carteret County, and Ocracoke Island and Hatteras Island. * WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to midnight EST tonight. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: East Carteret; Hatteras Island; Ocracoke Island
